110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Christopher,

From: christopher prosser [mailto:christopherprosserjr@gmail.com] Sent: Wednesday, December 14, 2011 4:01 PM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: Re: MBO Partners / christopher
steve,
yea i was checking out the site... i was not sure what you guys offered to tell you the truth. lets set up a time to chat, how about tomorrow at 3pm est? please let me know if thats going to work for you. thanks in advance
chris
503-964-7522 On Wed, Dec 14, 2011 at 3:36 PM, Steve Arhancet <sarhancet@mbopartners.com> wrote:
Dear christopher,
I noticed that you recently visited our website! We had a conversation some time ago regarding our services. As a courtesy I wanted to personally reach out and offer any assistance I can to help you find the answers you might be looking for. If you would like to chat, you may easily book a time convenient for you in my online schedule by going here https://my.timedriver.com/C9CPC.
Regards,
Steven ___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Consultant Services MBO Partners
